tests

Class AcceptanceTests

  • java.lang.Object
    • tests.AcceptanceTests

  • public class AcceptanceTests
extends java.lang.Object
    Acceptance tests which ensure that the new criteria for call charging are met. Does not use interface mocking as the idea is to test the system under normal running conditions.

        c2 - The callee.

        callEndTime - The call end time.
        callDurationMins - The call duration in minutes.
